channel.title: JamesScape
channel.description:
[center]Hello guys, this is my server:
[b]Home: http://james-scape.com/TOS.php Webclient: http://james-scape.com/webclient/webclient.html DL Client: http://james-scape.com/TestSite/others/dlclient.html
Forums: http://james-scape.com/smf2/[/b]
[b]Some info:[/b] Runs on 3GB+ Ram Great Internet connection 100% Uptime 20bosses+ (Nomad, Nex, God wars, Ect.) All skills New home! Great Community! Perfect Eco Many minigames (Including fight pits, duel arena, Castle Wars, and dominion tower!) 3 means of gambling (Horse game, Flower game (h/c), seal, and dice!) Customs (Like black/gold phat) Updates All the time Much more that can't be explained! All curses Summoning, dungeoneering, Construction, and Farming! Perfect animations News that yells on 99 or 120 skill levelups, recent updates, and rare drops! A validation system that checks your ips and protects your account from new ips, by answering 3 questions! -saves ip forever- A prestiging system where you can prestige once hitting 600m xp. Can gain rep by getting it fromstaff ( ::Giverep ) for when you yell!
[b]-Donors -[/b] Get a customized yell that they can change as much as they want! Get rare amours just for them! Get 10% per GP per sell to general shop
[b]- Pics -[/b]
[b][size=14pt]GE 66%:[/size][/b] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/14to2x.png[/img]
[b] [size=14pt]Gambling (All 3):[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2v0ld29.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/15ds3ep.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2nsoxnd.png[/img]
[b][size=14pt]Minigames:[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2lt6izc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/vq5cad.png[/img][/center]

item.title: JamesScape
item.dc:creator: @contaminated contaminated
item.description:
@contaminated wrote:

[quote=“bishoy119, post:2, topic:525879”][quote author=masan05 link=topic=644621.msg4337159#msg4337159 date=1374553495]
[center]Hello guys, this is my server:

[b]Home: http://james-scape.com/TOS.php
Webclient: http://james-scape.com/webclient/webclient.html
DL Client: http://james-scape.com/TestSite/others/dlclient.html

Forums: http://james-scape.com/smf2/[/b]

Some info:
Runs on 3GB+ Ram
Great Internet connection
100% Uptime
20bosses+ (Nomad, Nex, God wars, Ect.)
All skills
New home!
Great Community!
Perfect Eco
Many minigames (Including fight pits, duel arena, Castle Wars, and dominion tower!)
3 means of gambling (Horse game, Flower game (h/c), seal, and dice!)
Customs (Like black/gold phat)
Updates All the time
Much more that can’t be explained!
All curses
Summoning, dungeoneering, Construction, and Farming!
Perfect animations
News that yells on 99 or 120 skill levelups, recent updates, and rare drops!
A validation system that checks your ips and protects your account from new ips, by answering 3 questions! -saves ip forever-
A prestiging system where you can prestige once hitting 600m xp.
Can gain rep by getting it fromstaff ( ::Giverep ) for when you yell!

-Donors -
Get a customized yell that they can change as much as they want!
Get rare amours just for them!
Get 10% per GP per sell to general shop

- Pics -

[size=14pt]GE 66%:[/size]


[size=14pt]Gambling (All 3):[/size]

[size=14pt]Minigames:[/size]

2lt6izc.png1014×650

vq5cad.png1599×800
[/center]
[/quote]
Nice job, It looks like something I would join[/quote]

Read full topic
